author: milos88
content:
Original Portal Network is no longer actively under development (see related [announcement](https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1331655016993394770/1383060817116663848) ).

Modified form of Portal Network for the purpose of history expiry is under development (see [specs](https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/blob/master/history/history-network.md) ), at least by some EL clients.
